// Click Event
  .click(function(){
    var filter = map.findMarker('population', {limit: 1});
    map.updateMarker(filter, {move: 'bounce'});
  });

  map.addMarker([{
			lat: 41.3833,
			lng: 2.1833,
			data: {
				name: 'Barcelona',
				population: 1621000
			}
		},{
			lat: 40.419795,
			lng: -3.710436,
			data: {
				name: 'Madrid',
				population: 3234000
			}
		},{
			lat: 41.648821,
			lng: -0.889086,
			data: {
				name: 'Zaragoza',
				population: 679624
			}
		}
	], {filters: ['population']});
